Fast forward to February 2026, and Anthropic CPO Mike Krieger declares at Cisco's AI Summit that "Claude is now writing Claude" with "effectively 100%" AI-generated code at Anthropic. The reality? More complicated. LessWrong analysis suggests the actual figure is "closer to 90% than 50%" when including throwaway scripts, but industry-wide adoption sits at 20-40%.
